original_text: When the seventh month came and the Israelites had settled in their towns, the people assembled together as one in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 각자의 성읍에 살았더니 일곱째 달에 이르러 일제히 예루살렘에 모인지라

sentences.original_text: and the Israelites had settled in their towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 사람들이 그들의 도시에 정착했을 때

sentences.original_text: the people assembled together as one
